WorkItem.Description:
Been using Rawr for a bit now and all of a sudden I am getting internal compiler errors when I try to save my char...  Deleted Rawr and tried re-install same stuff. Compiler error CS0583 and CS0585: state 'BIND'.
Running vista 64 and re-installed .Net.
 
Here is the first part of the error report..
 
System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to generate a temporary class (result=1).
error CS0583: Internal Compiler Error (0xc0000005 at address 00000005380AA160): likely culprit is 'BIND'.
error CS0585: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'BIND'
error CS0585: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'BIND'
error CS0585: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'BIND'
error CS0585: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'BIND'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'BIND' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly.XmlSerializationWriterCalculationOptionsMage.Write5_CalculationOptionsMage(string, string, Rawr.Mage.CalculationOptionsMage, bool, bool)'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly.XmlSerializationWriterCalculationOptionsMage.Write5_CalculationOptionsMage(string, string, Rawr.Mage.CalculationOptionsMage, bool, bool)'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly.XmlSerializationWriterCalculationOptionsMage.Write5_CalculationOptionsMage(string, string, Rawr.Mage.CalculationOptionsMage, bool, bool)'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly.XmlSerializationWriterCalculationOptionsMage.Write5_CalculationOptionsMage(string, string, Rawr.Mage.CalculationOptionsMage, bool, bool)'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly.XmlSerializationWriterCalculationOptionsMage'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization.GeneratedAssembly'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml.Serialization'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft.Xml'
error CS0584: Internal Compiler Error: stage 'COMPILE' symbol 'Microsoft'
 
-

Comments.Message:
We need more information
Model, Char Name and Server
This looks like a corrupted .NET framework to me. That error is external to Rawr.
Thx, any suggestions on how to fix .NET framework then?  I have uninstalled and re-installed it and still get the same issues.  Mage model.. krokuss, proudmoore
Make sure you're installing .NET v3.5SP1. Beyond that, don't know.
